mapper.select: insert into tbl_mate(user_num, mate_courtname, mate_courtaddr, mate_date, mate_starttime, mate_endtime, mate_exp, mate_ntrp, mate_gametype, mate_mcount, mate_wcount, mate_content, mate_writedate) value(#{userNum}, #{mateCourtname}, #{mateCourtaddr}, #{mateDate}, #{mateStarttime}, #{mateEndtime}, #{mateExp}, #{mateNtrp}, #{mateGametype}, #{mateMcount}, #{mateWcount}, #{mateContent}, #{mateWritedate})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_mate SET mate_courtname = #{mateCourtname}, mate_courtaddr = #{mateCourtaddr}, mate_date = #{mateDate}, mate_starttime = #{mateStarttime}, mate_endtime = #{mateEndtime}, mate_exp = #{mateExp}, mate_ntrp = #{mateNtrp}, mate_gametype = #{mateGametype}, mate_mcount = #{mateMcount}, mate_wcount = #{mateWcount}, mate_content = #{mateContent}, mate_writedate = #{mateWritedate} where mate_num =#{mateNum}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_mate WHERE mate_courtname LIKE '%${searchQuery}%'
select m.*, u.user_num, u.user_nickname, u.user_gender, u.user_ntrp, u.user_exp from tbl_user u join tbl_mate m on u.user_num = m.user_num where m.mate_num = #{mateNum}
